body_html:
I encountered the same error when moving my project to Android Studio.
It can be resolved simply by extracting libtensorflow_demo.so from the APK built by bazel and copying it to the Android Studio project to app/src/main/jniLibs/armeabi-v7a/ .
body_text:

body:
I encountered the same error when moving my project to Android Studio.
It can be resolved simply by extracting libtensorflow_demo.so from the APK built by bazel and copying it to the Android Studio project to app/src/main/jniLibs/armeabi-v7a/ .
